title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Attitude Improvement Strategy Design for MOOC-Based Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more key factors that drive attitude changes in MOOC activities.
Learners can write a report analyzing peers' attitude changes using mixed research methods (surveys + interviews).
Learners can design customized attitude learning strategies considering differences in age, cultural background, and learning objectives.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
